name: Starship Annihilator
description: A classic style vertical scrolling-shooter. Includes 10 levels and 10 boss enemies. You will have several power-ups for weapon modification. Within each level, you will face different enemies, among which will vary from low to extreme levels of threat!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Processor: 2.0 GHz CPU Dual Core Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 512 Mb DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows Processor: Core i3 or higher Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 1 Gb DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 100 MB available space
